instanceVariables.name: section
instanceVariables.desc: every button in a section shares this var

instanceVariables.name: id
instanceVariables.desc: apply a unique ID to every instance in your game

instanceVariables.name: active
instanceVariables.desc: if this button is active or not (change via enable group functions)

instanceVariables.name: activeTrigger
instanceVariables.desc: secret bool for recording when this button has been activated

instanceVariables.name: chosenTrigger
instanceVariables.desc: secret bool for recording when this button has been chosen

instanceVariables.name: overrideUp
instanceVariables.desc: override this input - leave blank for normal navigation

instanceVariables.name: overrideDown
instanceVariables.desc: override this input - leave blank for normal navigation

instanceVariables.name: overrideLeft
instanceVariables.desc: override this input - leave blank for normal navigation

instanceVariables.name: overrideRight
instanceVariables.desc: override this input - leave blank for normal navigation

instanceVariables.name: oWidth
instanceVariables.desc: for size animations, can remove this if you'd like

instanceVariables.name: oHeight
instanceVariables.desc: for size animations, can remove this if you'd like

instanceVariables.name: mGrowWidth
instanceVariables.desc: for size animations, can remove this if you'd like

instanceVariables.name: mGrowHeight
instanceVariables.desc: for size animations, can remove this if you'd like
